result.markdown:
---
title: "Experimento fatorial e ajuste de modelos - Análise de correlação"
format: html
editor: visual
message: false
warning: false
---


Durante a aula 9,

## Pacotes carregados


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(gsheet)
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(performance)
library(DHARMa)
library(emmeans)
library(multcomp)
library(r4pde)
library(drc)
```
:::


## **Importando dados**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
milho <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=1345524759")
```
:::


## **visualização dos dados**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
milho |> 
  ggplot(aes(method,index))+
  geom_jitter(which = 0.1, alpha = 0.2)+
  facet_wrap(~ hybrid)+
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", size = 0.5, color = "blue")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
milho <- milho |> 
  mutate(block = as.factor(block))

mix2 <- lmer(sqrt(index) ~ hybrid*method + block + (1|block/hybrid), data = milho)

anova (mix2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Analysis of Variance Table
              npar  Sum Sq Mean Sq F value
hybrid           5 2.14415 0.42883  3.0632
method           1 0.54438 0.54438  3.8886
block            3 0.01004 0.00335  0.0239
hybrid:method    5 1.87331 0.37466  2.6762
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_normality(mix2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: residuals appear as normally distributed (p = 0.440).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_heteroscedasticity(mix2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: Error variance appears to be homoscedastic (p = 0.971).
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(simulateResiduals(mix2))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
qqnorm(residuals(mix2))
qqline(residuals(mix2))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hist(residuals(mix2))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-3.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
medias_milho <- emmeans(mix2,
                        ~ hybrid | method,
                        type = "response")
medias_milho
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
method = pin:
 hybrid   response   SE   df lower.CL upper.CL
 30F53 HX     25.0 12.1 6084     6.84     54.4
 30F53 YH     24.5 12.0 6084     6.61     53.7
 30K64        20.3 10.9 6084     4.51     47.4
 30S31H       37.1 14.8 6084    13.79     71.8
 30S31YH      31.7 13.7 6084    10.57     64.2
 BG7049H      19.4 10.7 6084     4.10     46.0

method = silk:
 hybrid   response   SE   df lower.CL upper.CL
 30F53 HX     24.4 12.0 6084     6.56     53.6
 30F53 YH     26.0 12.4 6084     7.42     56.0
 30K64        21.3 11.2 6084     5.00     48.9
 30S31H       26.3 12.5 6084     7.57     56.4
 30S31YH      26.4 12.5 6084     7.62     56.5
 BG7049H      19.1 10.6 6084     3.96     45.6

Results are averaged over the levels of: block 
Degrees-of-freedom method: kenward-roger 
Confidence level used: 0.95 
Intervals are back-transformed from the sqrt scale 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
medias_milho2 <- emmeans(mix2,
                         ~ method | hybrid,
                         type = "response")
medias_milho2
```

```

```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mix3 <- lmer(sqrt(index) ~ hybrid*method + block + (1|block/hybrid), data = milho)

anova (mix3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Analysis of Variance Table
              npar  Sum Sq Mean Sq F value
hybrid           5 2.14415 0.42883  3.0632
method           1 0.54438 0.54438  3.8886
block            3 0.01004 0.00335  0.0239
hybrid:method    5 1.87331 0.37466  2.6762
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_normality(mix3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: residuals appear as normally distributed (p = 0.440).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_heteroscedasticity(mix3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: Error variance appears to be homoscedastic (p = 0.971).
```
:::
:::


OUTR O PACOTE: estande


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
estande <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=401662555")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
   estande |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_jitter(which = 0.1, alpha = 0.3)+
  facet_wrap(~ exp)+
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", size = 0.5, color = "black")+
     geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = F)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


experimento 1


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exp1 <- estande |> 
  filter(exp == 1)

exp1 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(se = F)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#MODELO LINEAR
lm1 = lm(nplants ~ trat,
         data = exp1)

summary (lm1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = nplants ~ trat, data = exp1)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-25.500  -6.532   1.758   8.573  27.226 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  52.5000     4.2044  12.487 1.84e-11 ***
trat         -0.2419     0.1859  -1.301    0.207    
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 15 on 22 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.07148,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.02928 
F-statistic: 1.694 on 1 and 22 DF,  p-value: 0.2066
```
:::
:::


experimento 2


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exp2 <- estande |> 
  filter(exp == 2)

exp2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(se = F, method = "lm",
              formula = y~poly(x,2),
              color = "red")+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#Modelo de primeira ordem
lm2 <- lm(nplants~trat,
          data = exp2)

summary(lm2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = nplants ~ trat, data = exp2)

Residuals:
     Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
-25.7816  -7.7150   0.5653   8.1929  19.2184 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  60.9857     3.6304  16.798 4.93e-14 ***
trat         -0.7007     0.1605  -4.365 0.000247 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 12.95 on 22 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.4641,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.4398 
F-statistic: 19.05 on 1 and 22 DF,  p-value: 0.0002473
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hist(residuals(lm2))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Nodelo de segunda ordem
exp2$trat2 <- exp2$trat^2
```
:::


experimento 3


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exp3 <- estande |> 
  filter(exp == 3)

exp3 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(se = F) #method = "lm")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
lm3 <- lm(nplants~trat + trat2,
          data = exp2)

summary(lm3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = nplants ~ trat + trat2, data = exp2)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-25.439  -6.019   1.789   8.016  19.561 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept) 66.30156    4.42097  14.997 1.08e-12 ***
trat        -1.77720    0.58467  -3.040  0.00623 ** 
trat2        0.02223    0.01166   1.906  0.07036 .  
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 12.24 on 21 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.5432,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.4997 
F-statistic: 12.49 on 2 and 21 DF,  p-value: 0.0002675
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hist(residuals(lm3))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


#comparação de modelos diferente usando os mesmos dados

usando modelo linear generaliazado


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#glm2 <- glm(nplants ~ trat, family = gaussian, data = exp2)
#summary(glm2)

#AIC(glm2)

glm2b <- glm(nplants ~ trat, family = "poisson", data  = exp2)
summary(glm2b)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
glm(formula = nplants ~ trat, family = "poisson", data = exp2)

Coefficients:
             Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|)    
(Intercept)  4.134189   0.037583 110.003  < 2e-16 ***
trat        -0.016270   0.002059  -7.901 2.76e-15 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

(Dispersion parameter for poisson family taken to be 1)

    Null deviance: 139.783  on 23  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance:  69.578  on 22  degrees of freedom
AIC: 210.24

Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 4
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
glm2b <- glm(nplants ~ trat, family = poisson(link = "log"),
             data = exp2)
summary(glm2b)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
glm(formula = nplants ~ trat, family = poisson(link = "log"), 
    data = exp2)

Coefficients:
             Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|)    
(Intercept)  4.134189   0.037583 110.003  < 2e-16 ***
trat        -0.016270   0.002059  -7.901 2.76e-15 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

(Dispersion parameter for poisson family taken to be 1)

    Null deviance: 139.783  on 23  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance:  69.578  on 22  degrees of freedom
AIC: 210.24

Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 4
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
AIC(glm2b)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 210.2353
```
:::
:::


AIC menor é o melhor modelo ajustado.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
wm <- WhiteMoldSoybean


wm |> 
  ggplot(aes(inc, yld))+
  geom_point()+ 
  facet_wrap(~ study)+
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-19-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mofo1 <- lm(yld ~ inc,
            data = wm)
#intercepto pordutividade quando a incidencia é zero, inc é o slope com 10% de incidencia esta perdendo 90kg. 
summary(mofo1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = yld ~ inc, data = wm)

Residuals:
     Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
-1657.85  -594.50   -91.32   531.76  1693.15 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept) 3299.619     56.451  58.451  < 2e-16 ***
inc           -9.261      2.108  -4.393 1.45e-05 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 745.8 on 380 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.04833,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.04582 
F-statistic:  19.3 on 1 and 380 DF,  p-value: 1.452e-05
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
wm |> 
  ggplot(aes(inc, yld, group = factor(study)))+
  geom_point()+
  #facet_wrap(~ study)+
  theme_minimal()+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = F)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-21-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mofo1 <- lm(yld ~ inc,
            data = wm)
summary(mofo1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = yld ~ inc, data = wm)

Residuals:
     Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
-1657.85  -594.50   -91.32   531.76  1693.15 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept) 3299.619     56.451  58.451  < 2e-16 ***
inc           -9.261      2.108  -4.393 1.45e-05 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 745.8 on 380 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.04833,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.04582 
F-statistic:  19.3 on 1 and 380 DF,  p-value: 1.452e-05
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(broom)
fit_all <- wm |> 
  group_by(study) |> 
  do(tidy(lm(.$yld ~ .$inc), conf.int = TRUE))
fit_all
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 70 × 8
# Groups:   study [35]

   <dbl> <chr>          <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>

```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit_all |> 
  filter(term == "(intercept)") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = estimate))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 8, color = "white", fill = "gray50")+
  theme_r4pde()+
  labs(x = "slope", y = "frequency")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-23-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(patchwork)
```
:::


Aula 10 - 29/05


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#pacotes 
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
library(AgroR)
library(corrplot)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
imgs <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=373270992")
```
:::


r2: coeficiente de determinação o quento da variação de y explicada pelo x

coenficiente de correlação: a força de associação entre x e y


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
imgs1 <- imgs|> 
  ggplot(aes(Assess, LeafDoctor))+
geom_point()+ geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
imgs2 <- imgs|> 
  ggplot(aes(Assess, ImageJ))+
geom_point()+geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
imgs3 <- imgs |> 
  ggplot(aes(LeafDoctor, ImageJ))+
geom_point()+geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
imgs1 + imgs2 + imgs3
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-30-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#matriz de correlação 
imgs2 <- imgs |> 
  dplyr::select(3:5)

  corgraph(imgs2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
        Var1       Var2       cor            p
2 LeafDoctor     Assess 0.9666367 5.972544e-42
3     ImageJ     Assess 0.9776918 8.143613e-48
6     ImageJ LeafDoctor 0.9797478 3.144091e-49
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula9e10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-31-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cor.test(imgs$Assess, imgs$LeafDoctor)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Pearson's product-moment correlation

data:  imgs$Assess and imgs$LeafDoctor
t = 31.119, df = 68, p-value < 2.2e-16
alternative hypothesis: true correlation is not equal to 0
95 percent confidence interval:
 0.9466882 0.9792005
sample estimates:
      cor 
0.9666367 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
pyra <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=465348652")
```

```{.r .cell-code}
pyra2 <- pyra |> 
  group_by(code, dose) |> 
  summarise(mean_germination = mean(germination))

pyra2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(dose, mean_germination))+
  geom_point()+
  facet_wrap(~code)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
isolado165 <- pyra2 |> filter(code == "165")

drc1 <- drm(mean_germination ~ dose, data = isolado165,
            fct = LL.3()) 

AIC(drc1)
```
